Added_Other.name: FFlagAccountLockConsoleLogout_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Implements a logout feature for accounts that are locked on consoles.
Added_Other.purpose: Allows players to log out of their accounts if they are locked, improving account security.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableAccountLockModal_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces a modal window that appears when account locking is triggered.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances account security by informing players about potential account lock issues.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableBiometricChallenges_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Integrates biometric authentication for account security.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides players with a more secure way to access their accounts using fingerprints or facial recognition.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableChallengeRateLimit_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Limits the number of challenges a player can attempt in a certain timeframe.
Added_Other.purpose: Prevents players from spamming challenges, ensuring a fairer gameplay experience.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableNativeChallengeAbandonment_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows players to abandon challenges natively within the game.
Added_Other.purpose: Gives players the flexibility to exit challenges without penalty, improving game flow.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPersonaLivenessFocusNavigation_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves navigation focus for the persona interface.
Added_Other.purpose: Makes it easier for players to navigate their profiles and settings, improving user experience.
